name: Care Your Scorb
description:
A silly 5-minute horror experience inspired by the 2021 Spooky  Scoopy Scorpy Game Jam.

Keep your scorb well fed, protect him from mice trying to take his chips, and watch videos with him to keep him entertained. But could there be a darkness looming underneath the surface?

Will you care or will you scare?

Control with mouse only (LMB + RMB)

Requires an internet connection to play video

Content warning for mild gore, scares and poorly balanced audio.
